sentences.en: Be aware of your own feelings.
sentences.cn: 要注意自己的情绪。

sentences.en: Be particularly fastidious about washing your hands before touching food.
sentences.cn: 接触食物前尤其对洗手不能有半点马虎。

sentences.en: Be sure you get your daily quota of calcium.
sentences.cn: 要确保每天的钙摄入量。

sentences.en: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 人生就应该是快乐的，要抓住每一天，孩子们，让你们的生活变得非凡起来。

sentences.en: Could you move your car?
sentences.cn: 你能把你的车挪一下吗？

sentences.en: Don’t worry. It’s not your fault.
sentences.cn: 别担心，这不是你的错。

sentences.en: How do we know you're not just covering up for your friend?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么知道你不只是在为自己的朋友遮掩呢？

sentences.en: I like it. Do they have your size?
sentences.cn: 我喜欢。他们有你的号码吗？

sentences.en: I saw through your little ruse from the start.
sentences.cn: 从一开始我就看穿了你的小计谋。

sentences.en: If you take this medicine,all your symptoms will fall away.
sentences.cn: 如果你使用这种药物，你的所有症状将会消失。

sentences.en: If your skin becomes red, sore or very scaly, consult your doctor.
sentences.cn: 如果皮肤发红、瘙痒或脱皮，要向医生咨询。

sentences.en: Is that your brother over there?
sentences.cn: 那边的是你弟弟吗？

sentences.en: Just play it safe, cover your ass, keep your head down.
sentences.cn: 要谨慎行事，保护好自己并保持低调。

sentences.en: Keep your spending on luxuries down to manageable proportions.
sentences.cn: 将你在奢侈品上的花费降至可控范围。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: Wash your hands thoroughly with hot soapy water before handling any food.
sentences.cn: 在拿吃的之前，用热肥皂水把手好好地洗干净。

sentences.en: When you are sitting, keep your elbow on the arm rest.
sentences.cn: 坐立时，把胳膊肘靠在扶手上。

sentences.en: Why do you like your major?
sentences.cn: 你为什么喜欢你的主修科目?。

sentences.en: Will you lend me your jacket for a little while?
sentences.cn: 你能把上衣借给我穿一会儿吗？

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: You have to pay your outstanding bill before joining the scheme.
sentences.cn: 在参加该项目之前必须结清余账。

sentences.en: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.cn: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.en: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.cn: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

sentences.en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentences.cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

trans.tran_cn: 你/您的，你们的，任何人的
trans.tran_en: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to show that something belongs to them or is connected with them
used when speaking or writing to one or more people to show that something belongs to them or is connected with them
